msg: added a clean target for use when running Clover on Hudson.  Only cleans dest, not dist

author: mturk
msg: Add watchdog thread to Apache 2. It creates additional thread in child process if set for unatended maintenance of the workers

msg: QPID-897: this test was intermittently timing out when messages are not prefetched. This is a temporary fix until we use a configurable timeout.
